com.kontakt.sdk.android.manager

Class ActionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.connection.AbstractServiceConnector
      • com.kontakt.sdk.android.manager.ActionManager

  • public class ActionManager
extends AbstractServiceConnector
    Action Manager collaborates with Action Service (ActionService) and can delegate tasks to it by ActionController (ActionController). The manager provides Configuration (ActionManager.Configuration) which is applied to the service after successful connection. The Action manager implements ServiceConnector

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ActionManager.ActionNotifier
      Action notifier is part of Action Management configuration.
      static class  ActionManager.Configuration
      Each of the managers has its own configuration which is built and delivered to collaborating Service.

      • newInstance

        public static ActionManager newInstance(Context context)

      • setMemoryCacheSize

        public void setMemoryCacheSize(long unitCounts,
                               MemoryUnit unit)
        Sets memory cache size on Configuration builder (ActionManager.Configuration.Builder). The Action Service (ActionService) which collaborates with Action Manager performs http requests thanks to the RestClient (KontaktApiClient) in order to load previously defined actions for beacons in certain proximities. Once the action is loaded, it is cached in internal memory of the device. The cache is based on LruCache. Depending on the cache size the number of the http requests may be limited or actions may be loaded every time they are desired and absent in the internal cache. Please note, that it is advisable to provide size which will allow to reduce http requests to the minimum. You can easily specify, how many units and of which type should be reserved for the internal cache. If not set, 0 bytes is reserved for the internal cache.
        Parameters:
        unitCounts - - the memory unit counts,
        unit - - the memory unit type
        See Also:
        LruCache

      • registerActionNotifier

        public void registerActionNotifier(ActionManager.ActionNotifier notifier)
        Sets Actions notifier (ActionManager.ActionNotifier) indicating found Browser Actions ( BrowserAction) or Content Actions(ContentAction). This parameter should be set before actions support enabling. If not set, the null notifier is applied which does not notify about anything.
        Parameters:
        notifier - the notifier

      • getActionController

        public ActionController getActionController()
